name: mediaplayer
description: create a custom media player using native html

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && rollup -c && cp index.html dist/ && sed -i '' 's/script\/media\.js/script\/media.min.js/g' dist/index.html && cp -r style dist/ && cp favicon.ico dist/ && cp -r data dist/
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run server

author: Biswasindhu Mandal
